[Creative Extension 1] Counts the number of friends of a specific user in the network.

I

indexOfComma(String, int) - Static method in class SocialNetwork
[All Creative Extension] Finds the index of a specific occurrence of a comma in the social network string.

[Basic Task] Removes a specified user from the social network.

SocialNetwork - Class in Unnamed Package
This class represents a basic social network with functionalities for managing users and their friends.
